version_description:
Improvements
- Faster loading of the Homescreen
- Improved connection handling

Fixes
- Fixed an issue where in some cases a non proper text content has been displayed
- Various minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Improved stability and general optimizations
Trending on value detail page temporarily disabled

Solved problems:
- “No data available” Bug
- Error during project switch

- Further optimizations.
- Added Firebase analytics service to help us improve performance and stability of the app.
- Re-added the trend on the value detail pages.
